We are GMCI.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”95%” max_width=”90%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We are worldwide pioneers in manufacturing and supplying, industrial minerals to our esteemed customers. GMCI transmutes mineral ores into productive and profitable minerals, that extensively enhances the resourcefulness and eminence of our customers and their products.

Our sustainably manufactured, authentic products are free from adulterants and impurities. Their performance concerning heat resistance, high tensile strength, conductivity, and many other mechanical and physical properties are of the highest grade than the rest. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We take great attention to details over our products, therefore, presenting us outstanding in trustworthiness. We understand the requirement of our customers and deliver it with absolute allegiance.

GMCI’s consistent operations towards upgrading its inventiveness and proficiency make us the fastest-growing corporations in the world. We individualize our solutions to our customers, as it adds distinction and significance to our integrity.
